text: Pancracio Celdrán Gomáriz (1942 – 24 March 2019) was a Spanish professor and journalist. He wrote about history and literature of the medieval period. He was born in Murcia. He participated in radio tertulias (in effect, panel discussions). He was a contributor to No es un día cualquiera ("It's Not Just Another Day"), a weekend news magazine broadcast by Radio Nacional de España. Celdrán died on 24 March 2019 in Madrid, at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Pancracio Celdrán in Temas de Hoy. * Biography in La Esfera de los Libros. * Biography in Viceversa. * Works published by Pancracio Celdrán Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish academics Category:Spanish journalists Category:Spanish historians
title: Pancracio Celdrán
